Name: Willage
About the game: Episode I An interactive series. The main character goes grape picking to his dacha and has to face the unforeseen consequences. The first episode is a short and meditative journey to the suburbs in a small Eastern European country. You’ll have to purchase this game at your own risk, as the creators didn’t put much of a soul into it. The authors were inspired by gonzo journalism and B-movies. Your choice will not affect anything. It’s going to be a lot of wandering around and confronting less than obvious issues. Despite all the above, the developers will invest time and energy into this project to continue the story. Either way, be reasonable with your expectations here.
